description:
Do you constantly have no time to get all of your businesses done? Are you always out of time? Do you feel yourself suddenly overloaded with all at once? This course will help you to deal with these issues. You will learn how to manage your time, determine the main things and to move big issues from the dead point and also to get rid of piles of small stuff. This course will help you to manage your life.


Learn to plan YOUR life and to have time to do the most IMPORTANT things in YOUR life, using all the opportunities that come your way.


  • How to do the unloading of all your things
  • How to prioritize
  • How to concentrate on the main things
  • How to plan your day
  • How to find your strategic goals
  • How to work with big issues
  • How to get rid of small and unpleasant tasks and assignments
  • How to motivate yourself


This course is not just about TM or the TM tools. First of all, it is about how to take own life under control and not to let a pile of small things to affect the quality of your life.


  • 16 video lectures
  • 7 effective TM tools
  • 7 exercises to practice TM skills
  • overview of the 4 free TM apps


If you don't want to listen to theoretical considerations on TM and want to get to practice at once, then this course is for you.
title: Renewed Time Management: 7 the Most Efficient Methods
